name: BackStage (BlueLumin)
description:
I made this game for the Beginners Game Jam 2020. It was a really great learning experience, and even though I don't think the game turned out that good, I am really glad I managed to have a working game at the end of the two weeks.

Our theme for the game jam was "Game Show". I tried to go with a slightly different approach and create a game that took place during a game show where the player has to complete tasks to make sure the show runs smoothly.

All code, art and music were made during the game jam.

Game design/Programming/Art - BlueLumin

Music and Sound Effects - Josie and Sara
